Pridraga - house second row to the sea For sale is a detached house with an area of ​​139m2 with a garage and an auxiliary building of 14m2 on a plot of land of 379m2. Only 50 m aawy from the sea and the beach. A landscaped promenade along the beach. Basement: - a large furnished room for relaxation and fitness, - tavern, - garage, - additional space. Ground floor: - the kitchen, - living room, - bathroom with a toilet, - a terrace of approximately 20 m2 that opens onto the garden with a sea view. High groundfloor: - three bedrooms, - bathroom with a toilet. Very peaceful and quiet environment. The possibility of installing a swimming pool in the yard. Ideal for a year-round stay or engaging in tourist activities. POSSIBLE EXCHANGE FOR AN APARTMENT IN ZADAR! Brokerage fee in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions.
